016package com.nickbenn.adventofcode.day13;
017
018import com.nickbenn.adventofcode.view.DataSource;
019import java.io.IOException;
020import java.util.List;
021import java.util.stream.IntStream;
022import java.util.stream.Stream;
023
024public class PointOfIncidence {
025
026  private static final int VERTICAL_MULTIPLIER = 1;
027  private static final int HORIZONTAL_MULTIPLIER = 100;
028
029  private final List<char[][]> patterns;
030
031  public PointOfIncidence() throws IOException {
032    this(DataSource.DEFAULT_INPUT_FILE);
033  }
034
035  public PointOfIncidence(String inputFile) throws IOException {
036    DataSource source = new DataSource.Builder(this)
037        .setInputFile(inputFile)
038        .build();
039    try (Stream<Stream<String>> blocks = source.paragraphLines()) {
040      patterns = blocks
041          .map((block) -> block
042              .map(String::toCharArray)
043              .toArray(char[][]::new)
044          )
045          .toList();
046    }
047  }
048
049  public static void main(String[] args) throws IOException {
050    System.out.println(new PointOfIncidence().getReflectionSum(0));
051    System.out.println(new PointOfIncidence().getReflectionSum(1));
052  }
053
054  public int getReflectionSum(int smudgesRequired) {
055    return patterns
056        .stream()
057        .mapToInt((pattern) ->
058            HORIZONTAL_MULTIPLIER * (getFirstHorizontalReflection(pattern, smudgesRequired) + 1)
059                + VERTICAL_MULTIPLIER * (getFirstVerticalReflection(pattern, smudgesRequired) + 1)
060        )
061        .sum();
062  }
063
064  private int getFirstHorizontalReflection(char[][] pattern, int smudgesRequired) {
065    return IntStream.range(0, pattern.length - 1)
066        .filter((rowIndex) -> {
067          int smudgeCount = 0;
068          outer:
069          for (int upIndex = rowIndex, downIndex = rowIndex + 1;
070              upIndex >= 0 && downIndex < pattern.length;
071              upIndex--, downIndex++) {
072            char[] upRow = pattern[upIndex];
073            char[] downRow = pattern[downIndex];
074            for (int colIndex = 0; colIndex < pattern[rowIndex].length; colIndex++) {
075              if (upRow[colIndex] != downRow[colIndex] && ++smudgeCount > smudgesRequired) {
076                break outer;
077              }
078            }
079          }
080          return (smudgeCount == smudgesRequired);
081        })
082        .limit(1)
083        .findFirst()
084        .orElse(-1);
085  }
086
087  private int getFirstVerticalReflection(char[][] pattern, int smudgesRequired) {
088    return IntStream.range(0, pattern[0].length - 1)
089        .filter((colIndex) -> {
090          int smudgeCount = 0;
091          outer:
092          for (char[] row : pattern) {
093            for (int leftIndex = colIndex, rightIndex = colIndex + 1;
094                leftIndex >= 0 && rightIndex < row.length;
095                leftIndex--, rightIndex++) {
096              if (row[leftIndex] != row[rightIndex] && ++smudgeCount > smudgesRequired) {
097                break outer;
098              }
099            }
100          }
101          return (smudgeCount == smudgesRequired);
102        })
103        .limit(1)
104        .findFirst()
105        .orElse(-1);
106  }
107
108}
